DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate if the Step up protocol is equal or superior regarding efficacy and security than the step down protocol. In couple submitted two intrauterine insemination.
DOC.brief_title: Step Up Versus Step Down in Controlled Ovarian Stimulation
DOC.criteria: Women with unexplained sterility with needs of intrauterine insemination. Contraindications to intrauterine insemination.
